title: World Map Problems #1
body:
_Disclaimer_:I personally love the map, I appreciate the work Rito writers and artists do so we have a universe.
the map is [HERE](https://map.leagueoflegends.com/en_US).

So, lets begin.

**DEMACIA**
- Is Demacia a Hermit kingdom? what happened to their port cities? 
- What happened to Shyvana? why isn't her birthplace and (or) her sanctuary on the map?(note,Ashe has her own place on the map)
- why dosen't demacia take a little more land? i mean the land eastern to them is surrounded by ocean and mountains, and the silent forest is there as well.

**NOXUS**
-I understand swains decision to stop the conquering of the lands, but why not TAKE LAND THAT IS SURROUNDED BY THEIRS? (look at that area wheres stonewall is)
- Shouldn't riven be a Ionian champion? since she thats what she considers herself.
- Why hasn't Noxus attacked Zuan and Piltover? sure they have technology, but the history has taught us that brute force will always beat technology, Noxus and their use of magic should be able to annihilate a small trading city.

**Piltover/Zaun**
- I get it, its a city. but what happened to its geography? can we have a city map maybe? (from a top down view)


**Shurima**
I actually don't have that many problems with shurima but,
- where is rek'sais current home? did she just swim back to icathia?
(MEME) why isn't rammus the king of the land?

**M.Targon**
**_(please Reference Piltover/Zaun)_**


Edit: I originally wanted this to be one megathread, but i realized alot of my facts were infact answered, so I have to edit and re-read everything else :(

replies.body:
I have some answers for you so, let's do this: 

> DEMACIA

* Is Demacia a Hermit kingdom? what happened to their port cities?

Yes. It's an hermit kingdom. In the [Medarda's map](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/piltover/medarda-heirloom) they say it. No "official" trade permitted. 

* Why dosen't demacia take a little more land? i mean the land eastern to them is surrounded by ocean and mountains, and the silent forest is there as well.

It's a lot of land more to protect if they reach till Nockmirch. Anyway they go to fight out there from time to time. In "[For Demacia](https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/story/for-demacia/)" story we found that there was a battle in the Gates of Mourning between the Dauntless Vanguard and the Trifarian Legion. 


> NOXUS

* I understand swains decision to stop the conquering of the lands, but why not TAKE LAND THAT IS SURROUNDED BY THEIRS? (look at that area wheres stonewall is)

Probably not that easy. And probably it's one of the next objectives before Pilltover's war. 

- Why hasn't Noxus attacked Zuan and Piltover? sure they have technology, but the history has taught us that brute force will always beat technology, Noxus and their use of magic should be able to annihilate a small trading city.

Read "[Progress Day](https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/story/piltover-progress-day/)" story. They're preparing the ground. 

> Piltover/Zaun

* I get it, its a city. but what happened to its geography? can we have a city map maybe? (from a top down view)

Look at the images that come with the map. It gives you a good idea. 

> Shurima

* Where is rek'sais current home? did she just swim back to icathia?

In the Sai Kaleek north of Icathia and southeast of Ancient Shurima.

> * Where is rek'sais current home? did she just swim back to icathia?
> 
> In the Sai Kaleek north of Icathia and southeast of Ancient Shurima.

The above Questions are my foolishness for not reading the stories, but:
I'm asking why dosen't sai'kaleek have its own pin? ashe gets her own, why dosen't a void creature that can eat 2 fucking animals in less then a second?
In twitter they're saying that the map will expand a lot in time. Probably we'll see Sai Kaleek with it's own pin (and a lot more) in the future when we know more about the grown voidlings.

We've seen Noxian forces get beaten by simple bombs and gases in Darius's comic.  Piltover would be able to do so much more than that.
